Package org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class HOAFConverter

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.HOAFConverter
public class HOAFConverter
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides conversions for automata in Hanoi Omega-Automata Format (HOAF). Note that if the automaton to be encoded has a classical alphabet, it will be saved in HOAF with a propositional alphabet and aliases.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
